title: Weight
vata: Usually thin, often difficult to put on weight, visible ribs, weight can vary
kapha: Larger, difficult to lose weight, heavy bones

title: Skin
pitta: Oily, smooth, warm, freckles & moles, rosy or copper. sunburns easily

title: Hair
pitta: Reddish tinge, oily, early receding or balding, graying medium thickness

title: Eyes
vata: Smaller, scanty lashes, white part looks, a bit gray, nervous, blinking
pitta: Piercing, intense, light sensitive, white part often reddish or yellow
kapha: Larger, calm, thick lashes, beautiful, white part clear & white

title: Teeth & Gums
vata: Too many or not enough teeth, irregular, gaps, overcrowded, receding gums
pitta: Moderate size, teeth can yellow, gums bleed easily

title: Circulation
vata: Variable to poor (eg: cold hands & feet)

title: Stool
vata: Irregular; not always daily, constipated, hard, little pieces, gas
pitta: Regular; daily + soft, loose, burns, can be yellowish or greenish
kapha: Large well formed, oily, regular, but not too frequent

title: Nose
pitta: Longer, pointed, tip may be red, sharp

title: Emotions
kapha: Calm, can be over-attached & posseive, slow to anger

title: Temperament
vata: Variable, changeable, excitable, creative, sociable, makes friends easily
pitta: Motivated, competitive, driven, impatient, controlling, likes to interact for a purpose
kapha: Happy & easy going, can be lazy reserved

title: Speech
vata: Fast, frequent, higher-pitched, can go on tangents
pitta: Good orators, articulate, can be sharp, argumentative, medium tone

title: Mind
vata: Very quick, adaptable, curious, restless, can lose interest quickly

title: Memory
vata: Quick but, absent-minded, learns & forgets easily
kapha: Slower to grasp initial idea but once remembers does not forget easily
